Package com.collaboportal.common.oauth2.controller

Class OAuth2AuthController

java.lang.Object
com.collaboportal.common.oauth2.controller.OAuth2AuthController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/auth") public class OAuth2AuthController extends Object
增强的OAuth2认证控制器 集成多个设计模式，支持多OAuth2提供商的统一认证

      @GetMapping("/{provider}/**") public void autoLogin(@PathVariable String provider, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
